content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: hay_block
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 14}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 7, "index": 15}, {"type": "black_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 19}, {"type": "shulker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 60, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "acacia_trapdoor", "quantity": 37, "index": 23}, {"type": "blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 42, "index": 25}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 48, "index": 28}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 29, "index": 29}, {"type": "stone_stairs", "quantity": 44, "index": 33}, {"type": "rabbit_spawn_egg", "quantity": 36, "index": 34}, {"type": "blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 40}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 3, "index": 43}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 9, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a hay block, I need to place 9 wheat in a 3x3 square in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the wheat from slot 14 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
